#include <stdio.h>

typedef long long int64;

int64 modular_pow(int64 base, int64 exponent, int64 modulus)
{
	int64 result = 1;
	while (exponent > 0)
	{
		if (exponent % 2 == 1)
			result = (result * base) % modulus;
		exponent >>= 1;
		base = (base * base) % modulus;
	}
	return result;
}

int main()
{
	int64 a, b;
	while (1)
	{
		scanf("%lld%lld", &a, &b);
		if (a == 0LL && b == 0LL)
			return 0;
		printf("%lld\n", modular_pow(a, b, 1000000));
	}
}
